vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H3473', 'matchingForm': 'יִשְׁפָּן', 'stepTransliteration': 'yish.pan', 'gloss': 'Ishpan', '_searchResultRange': '1Chr.8.22', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '伊施班', '_es_Gloss': 'Isphán', '_zh_Gloss': '伊施班'}, {'strongNumber': 'H8226', 'matchingForm': 'שָׂפַן', 'stepTransliteration': 'sa.phan', 'gloss': 'to treasure', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '珍寶', '_es_Gloss': 'tesoros', '_zh_Gloss': '珍宝'}, {'strongNumber': 'H8227B', 'matchingForm': 'שָׁפָן', 'stepTransliteration': 'sha.phan', 'gloss': 'Shaphan', '_searchResultRange': '2Kgs.22.3-Jer.43.6', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '沙番', '_es_Gloss': 'Saphán', '_zh_Gloss': '沙番'}, {'strongNumber': 'H8227G', 'matchingForm': 'שָׁפָן', 'stepTransliteration': 'sha.phan', 'gloss': 'Shaphan', '_searchResultRange': 'Ezek.8.11', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '沙番', '_es_Gloss': 'Saphán', '_zh_Gloss': '沙番'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
rock badger, coney, the hyrax
§ rock badger, coney, the hyrax
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   tejón ; (2)   hijo de Asalías; secretario; en tiempos del rey Josías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
陽性名詞
1) 石獾 #利 11:5; 申 14:7|
陽性專有名詞 人名
沙番
1) 猶大王約西亞的秘書或書記
2) 與猶大王約西亞同時代的亞希甘之父親 (耶 26:24) (代下 34:20)
可能與 1 同
3) 耶利米時代以利亞薩的父親(耶 29:3)
可能與 2 同
4) 一名書記, 基瑪利雅的父親(耶 36:10)
可能與 1 同
5) 以西結時代雅撒尼亞的父親(結 8:11)
可能與 1 同
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
阳性名词
1) 石獾 #利 11:5; 申 14:7|
阳性专有名词 人名
沙番
1) 犹大王约西亚的秘书或书记
2) 与犹大王约西亚同时代的亚希甘之父亲 (耶 26:24) (代下 34:20)
可能与 1 同
3) 耶利米时代以利亚萨的父亲(耶 29:3)
可能与 2 同
4) 一名书记, 基玛利雅的父亲(耶 36:10)
可能与 1 同
5) 以西结时代雅撒尼亚的父亲(结 8:11)
可能与 1 同

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.22.3;
son of: Azaliah (H0683);
father of: Ahikam (H0296), Elasah (H0501J), Gemariah (H1587H)
§ Shaphan = "coney"
n pr m
1) secretary or scribe of king Josiah of Judah
2) father of Ahikam in the time of king Josiah of Judah
2a) improbably the same as 2
3) father of Elasah in the time of the prophet Jeremiah
3a) perhaps the same as 3
4) a scribe and father of Gemariah
4a) perhaps the same as 2
5) father of Jaazaniah in the time of Ezekiel
5a) perhaps the same as 2

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezk.8.11;
father of: Jaazaniah (H2970H)
§ Shaphan = "coney"
n pr m
1) secretary or scribe of king Josiah of Judah
2) father of Ahikam in the time of king Josiah of Judah
2a) improbably the same as 2
3) father of Elasah in the time of the prophet Jeremiah
3a) perhaps the same as 3
4) a scribe and father of Gemariah
4a) perhaps the same as 2
5) father of Jaazaniah in the time of Ezekiel
5a) perhaps the same as 2
